pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayes Factors for Hierarchical Linear Models with Continuous Predictors // Runs hierarchical linear Bayesian models. Samples from the posterior distributions of model parameters in JAGS (Just Another Gibbs Sampler; Plummer, 2017, http://mcmc- jags.sourceforge.net). Computes Bayes factors for group parameters of interest with the Savage-Dickey density ratio (Wetzels, Raaijmakers, Jakab, Wagenmakers, 2009, doi:10.3758/PBR.16.4.752).
